data.prayer: Over 7.39 percent of the people of Saint Lucy are far from Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Lucy, Barbados
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 9,700 citizens of Saint Lucy, Barbados, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 2 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Saint Lucy
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Saint Lucy to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Crab Hill
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Crab Hill, Saint Lucy, Barbados.
Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Saint Lucy, Barbados.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Saint Lucy, Barbados.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Father, let your Word be a lamp to the feet of the 3,264 believers in Saint Lucy, Barbados.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.
